plan.title: Update Parcel Type Definition
plan.description: Add the 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel type definition to support the new column in the UI.
rationale: The Parcel type needs to include the new 'delivered_at' field to ensure type safety across the application.
implementationChecklist: Add 'delivered_at' field to the Parcel interface.
Ensure the field is optional if not always present.
doneWhen: 'delivered_at' field is added to Parcel type without TypeScript errors.

plan.title: Modify Parcel API to Include 'Delivered At' Field
plan.description: Update the parcel API service to ensure the 'delivered_at' field is included in the parcel response.
rationale: The API service must provide the 'delivered_at' data to populate the new column in the UI.
implementationChecklist: Update the API call to include 'delivered_at' in the response.
Ensure error handling is in place for missing data.
doneWhen: API response includes 'delivered_at' field without errors.

plan.title: Add 'Delivered At' Column to Parcels Table
plan.description: Modify the Parcels page to include the 'Delivered At' column in the table, ensuring sorting and filtering work correctly.
rationale: The UI needs to display the new 'Delivered At' column to users with appropriate sorting and filtering functionality.
implementationChecklist: Add 'Delivered At' column to the table.
Implement sorting functionality for the new column.
Ensure the column displays 'Not Delivered' when data is unavailable.
doneWhen: 'Delivered At' column is visible and sortable in the Parcels table.

plan.title: Update Table Renderer for New Column
plan.description: Modify the TableRenderer component to support rendering of the new 'Delivered At' column.
rationale: The TableRenderer component must be updated to handle the new column rendering logic.
implementationChecklist: Update column definitions to include 'Delivered At'.
Ensure the column uses the correct date format: 'DD MMM YYYY, hh:mm A'.
doneWhen: TableRenderer correctly displays the 'Delivered At' column with the specified format.

plan.title: Add Tests for 'Delivered At' Column Functionality
plan.description: Create tests to ensure the 'Delivered At' column is displayed correctly and supports sorting.
rationale: Testing is required to ensure the new column functions correctly and does not introduce regressions.
implementationChecklist: Write tests to check if the 'Delivered At' column is visible.
Test display of 'Not Delivered' for missing data.
doneWhen: All tests for the 'Delivered At' column pass successfully.

acceptanceCriteria: All TypeScript compilation errors are resolved (tsc exits 0)
All existing tests continue to pass after changes
